items.title: ‘This seems absolutely insane’: Our children pay rent on our investment properties. Our lawyer says they should still buy us out.
items.description: “They have already paid the mortgage. It makes no sense to require them to ‘pay’ it again.”

items.title: My Taiwanese immigrant friend started working in Walmart for minimum wage and retired with $2 million. What was her secret?
items.description: “She owns two houses and lives with a disabled son.”

items.title: A squash game saved this famous trader’s life. How prevalent is male breast cancer?
items.description: The investor Steve Eisman said he has breast cancer and is undergoing treatment for the disease.

items.title: ‘This feels like an opportunity’: I’m 55, earn $78,000 and have no kids. My mother gave me $10,000. What should I do?
items.description: “I also have $1,000 on a credit card, which will be paid in full next month.”

items.title: ‘The stress at my job is getting worse every day’: I’m 61, earn $177K, and have a 401(k) with $965K. Do I retire and downsize?
items.description: “I don’t want to end up in a nursing home on Medicare like my grandma.”
